title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 543.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 543.3 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part applies to any person who has been or may be
disqualified from possessing a firearm pursuant to
18
U.S.C. section
922(d)(4) and
(g)(4), due to being committed to a mental
institution or adjudicated as having a mental disability, as such terms are
defined in this Part and whose records were submitted to the NICS system by the

Office of Mental Health in accordance with section
7.09
of the

Mental Hygiene Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
543.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
